meanings.sent1: He decarburizes the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith decarburizes the iron to improve its quality.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion decarburizes the cursed sword, making it shine brightly.
meanings.sent4: Time decarburizes memories, leaving only the pure essence.
meanings.sent5: The fire decarburizes the wood, revealing its natural beauty.

meanings.definition: To undergo a process of losing carbon
meanings.sent1: The steel decarburizes when exposed to high temperatures.
meanings.sent2: During the heat treatment, the metal decarburizes slowly.
meanings.sent3: The naughty carbon atom decarburizes itself to play a prank on the chemist.
meanings.sent4: As the coal decarburizes, it transforms into a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The ancient manuscript decarburizes over time, fading into obscurity.
